Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Hmph. Am I really going to be stuck with you two?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The red-haired man smiles, showing his fangs like a vicious dog.'}
{2: '???', 3: "What'd you two do to land yourselves here?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Vera casts a disdainful look at the grinning red-haired man. She then turns to Nikola, pointing at the man.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Dear Commander, did you ask us to come all the way here... just to assign this idiot to my squad?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'This is Noctis. He used to be in the Purifying Force, but was reassigned to the Task Force for some reason... You will form the new Cerberus squad together.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nikola glances at Noctis, who is sitting on the chair in a rather informal pose.'}

{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Don't judge him by his looks. After all, he is a Purifying Force elite who specializes in close-quarter combat and explosives. He's also qualified for remote connection... More than enough to be your member.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What? Member? Someone told me that I would be the captain!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nikola gives a "saw it coming" smile and tosses Noctis\' transfer files to him.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "It must be Hassen. Unfortunately, his promise doesn't work here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: '****! That old bastard fooled me!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Noctis suddenly notices that the white-haired girl next to the obnoxious red-haired woman has disappeared. The next moment, he realizes she has already come to his side.'}
{3: "Noctis' battle instinct makes him put up a defensive posture, but she seems to have no intention of attacking."}
{3: 'All No. 21 did was sniff around Noctis a few times. When he gives her a sharp stare, she quickly trots back to Vera.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What are you doing...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You don't need to smell him to know that.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey! Are you trying to get me mad?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 stares at Noctis seriously, then blinks and says.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "But he's still strong...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'That will do. I prefer partners who are not that smart.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'None of their words sound like a compliment, but Noctis seems quite glad.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Aha, I didn't expect a dwarf like you to have such good sense. Just hide behind me when there's a fight, weakling.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I don\'t know what a "weakling" is... But I\'m not a weakling.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Noctis bursts into laughter as No. 21's face rapidly darkens."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Haha, what do you want? Wanna hit me? C'mon, hit here! Oops, can those little arms really reach me?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Taking advantage of his long reach, Noctis tries to poke No. 21's forehead. Just when his finger is about to touch her, a dark shadow appears out of nowhere."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What the...? What is this thing?!', 4: '1'}
{3: "No. 21's Co-Bot, who has been staying by her side all the time, tightly clamps onto Noctis' face like a custom-made mask, completely blocking his vision."}
{3: 'â€”Which also prevents him from noticing a full-strength kick aimed at his stomach.'}
{3: "The sudden, powerful impact sends Noctis into the storage room of Nikola's office like an empty can, spinning and flying."}
{3: 'As No. 21 also rushes inside and engages in a fight with Noctis, furious shouts and fighting noises begin to echo in the office that is usually too quiet.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'I want to take back my initial comment...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Despite the intense fight, Vera continues to lean against Nikola's desk, reading through Noctis' documents as if nothing has happened."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Told you he would be a great candidate.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I'm not talking about Noctis. It's you... I'm impressed that you have the guts to choose us as your direct subordinates. You seem to be a lot braver than those bureaucrats.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nikola snorts and smiles nonchalantly.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Hmph... Just do some regular Task Force missions for now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Adapt and adjust yourselves as fast as you can. Soon, you\'ll have a real "mission" to do.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Vera takes the list from Nikola and carefully browses through it with a smile. She picks the first combat mission for Cerberus in no time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "But there's another problem to be solved right now...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nikola opens the contact list on his terminal and finds a name on the very top.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Celica? It's me. Can you ask the Engineering Force for someone who's not on a mission...?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Before he could finish, a loud explosion came from the storage room, followed by thick smoke.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Wait, no... I want a full team here with equipment and building materials. My office probably needs a renovation.', 4: '1'}
